thread.title: Indonesia Tackles Wages in Latest Rules Package - WSJ
thread.title_full: Indonesia Tackles Wages in Latest Rules Package - WSJ

author: Sara Schonhardt
title: Indonesia Tackles Wages in Latest Rules Package - WSJ
text:
JAKARTAâ€”Indonesia went after the prickly issue of labor Thursday in the latest round of measures aimed at stimulating the sagging economy and encouraging foreign investment, setting a formula that would allow for more predictable minimum wage increases.
The policy package is the fourth in a month issued by President Joko Widodo to reverse the slowest growth in six years, brought on in large part by slack demand from China for... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
